name: MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor
desc: An object that you use to configure new rasterization rate maps.

items.name: init(screenSize: MTLSize, label: String?)
items.desc: A convenience initializer that creates a rate map descriptor with a given size and identifier.

items.name: init(screenSize: MTLSize, layer: MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor, label: String?)
items.desc: A convenience initializer that creates a rate map descriptor with a single rate layer.

items.name: init(screenSize: MTLSize, layers: [MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor], label: String?)
items.desc: A convenience initializer that creates a rate map descriptor with a set of layer descriptors.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string used to identify the rate map you create with the descriptor.

items.name: var screenSize: MTLSize
items.desc: The size of the viewport coordinate system, in logical pixels.

items.name: var layerCount: Int
items.desc: The number of layers in the rate map.

items.name: func layer(at: Int) -> MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor?
items.desc: Returns the layer description for a layer in the rate map.

items.name: func setLayer(MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor?, at: Int)
items.desc: Sets a configuration for a layer rate map.

items.name: var layers: MTLRasterizationRateLayerArray
items.desc: The rasterization rates for one or more layers in the rate map.

items.name: class MTLRasterizationRateLayerArray
items.desc: Descriptions for the rasterization rates to apply to the set of layers in a rate map.
